column4: actually, to see which video driver is loaded you would probably check "lsmod"  or go through the /var/log/Xorg.0.log  or do "lshw" many options really.
and how do I change it?
if you open /etc/X11/xorg.conf it gives you a command at the top to change the video drivers, but if you have Ati or Nvidia there is a proper method for that.
install the correct drives, use the restricted package, check the forums, there is a Dell subforum in ubuntuforums.org
